products.title: Our Machines
products.subtitle: Discover our range of advanced packaging solutions
products.heading: Choose the Perfect TP@CK Machine for Your Needs
products.description: Our range of packaging solutions is designed to meet various operational scales and requirements, from small businesses to large enterprises.
products.helpText: Need help choosing the right solution? Our experts can provide a customized recommendation.

testimonials.sectionDescription: Hear directly from our clients about how TP@CK's innovative solutions have transformed their operations and delivered measurable results.
testimonials.quote1: The TP@CK T30 has transformed our warehouse operations. The WMS integration was seamless, and we've seen a 32% increase in packaging efficiency within the first month.
testimonials.quote2: What impressed me most about TP@CK was the predictive maintenance system. We've had zero unexpected downtime since implementation, which is unprecedented for our 24/7 operation.
testimonials.quote3: As a company committed to sustainability, the environmental certifications of TP@CK's systems were a deciding factor. The reduced material waste has also contributed to our bottom line.
testimonials.quote4: The T50 system exceeded our throughput expectations. The dual-mode operation gives us flexibility to adapt to seasonal demand fluctuations without compromising on quality.

markets.sectionDescription: Our packaging solutions are tailored to meet the specific requirements of various industries, delivering exceptional value and operational efficiency.

logistics.title: Logistics
logistics.description: TP@CK offers logisticians an optimal integration with their WMS/WCS systems, enabling real-time traceability and efficient flow management. By reducing transport costs and improving space utilization, TP@CK is the ideal solution to optimize supply chains and meet the evolving demands of the logistics sector.

distribution.title: Large Distribution
distribution.description: Large distribution networks benefit from a reliable and high-performance packaging solution. TP@CK minimizes waste and optimizes storage spaces, ensuring better supply management and significant reductions in logistical costs. Tailored to the high demands of the sector, TP@CK delivers an innovative solution to maintain competitive advantage.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.description: For the e-commerce sector, TP@CK represents a tailor-made solution that combines speed, flexibility, and environmental responsibility. With customized, optimized packaging, TP@CK reduces transport costs and enhances the customer experience while meeting increasing expectations for sustainability and innovation.

cuisine.title: Kitchen Industry
cuisine.description: Cuisinists will find in TP@CK a solution perfectly suited to their needs, combining robustness with aesthetic appeal. By ensuring optimal product protection and efficient space utilization, TP@CK adds value to products while reducing costs. This innovative solution is particularly relevant for installations requiring high performance and strong profitability.

cta.heading: Schedule a Personalized Demo of TP@CK Solutions
cta.description: Our experts will guide you through the features that matter most to your operation and provide a tailored recommendation based on your specific needs.

dashboard.title: Real-Time Machine Status Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor the operational status, production metrics, and performance indicators of all TP@CK machines in real-time.
dashboard.accessText: Access the admin dashboard for detailed analytics and controls

t20.tagline: Compact, entry-level packaging solution ideal for small to medium businesses
t20.description: The T20 is a robust solution for businesses with moderate output requirements. Its compact footprint makes it perfect for facilities with limited space while maintaining excellent performance and reliability.

t30.tagline: Mid-range packaging system with enhanced speed and flexibility
t30.description: The T30 offers the perfect balance of performance and versatility. Designed for growing enterprises, it delivers increased throughput while maintaining operational efficiency and reliability.

benefits.1: Dual operation modes for different product types

t50.tagline: High-performance packaging solution for enterprise-scale operations
t50.description: The T50 is our premium solution for large-scale operations requiring maximum throughput and reliability. With advanced automation and intelligent controls, it represents the pinnacle of packaging technology.

login.title: Admin Login
login.subtitle: Secure access for TP@CK administrators. Only authorized personnel may proceed.
login.forgotPassword: Forgot your password? Contact your system administrator.

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to the TP@CK administrative control panel.
dashboard.demoNotice: This is a demonstration of the admin dashboard with role-based access control. In a production environment, additional security measures would be implemented.

analytics.title: {machine} Performance Analytics
analytics.subtitle: Historical performance data and trends analysis
analytics.noData: No data available for this machine
analytics.efficiencyInsight: {machine} has maintained an average efficiency rate of {rate}% over the selected period.
analytics.productionInsight: Peak production was observed on {date} with {units} units.
analytics.temperatureHighInsight: High temperature alerts occurred {count} times during this period.
analytics.temperatureNormalInsight: Temperature has remained within optimal range throughout the period.

integration.apiInstruction: Download complete API documentation for system integration:

controls.title: Machine Parameters Control
controls.description: Modify machine settings and parameters. Changes will be reflected in real-time on the dashboard.
controls.viewOnly: You have view-only access. To modify machine parameters, please log in with an operator or admin account.

system.title: System Settings
system.description: Configure global system parameters and preferences

info.title: System Information
info.description: This is a demonstration of the admin control panel functionality with role-based permissions.
info.viewOnly: You have view-only access to system settings.

system.advancedDescription: Access advanced configuration options for administrators

roles.adminDesc: You have full permissions to control all machine parameters and settings.
roles.operatorDesc: You can control machine parameters but cannot change system settings.
roles.viewerDesc: You have read-only access to monitor machines. Controls are disabled.
